sentences.chinese: 佛罗伦萨的女人在耳垂上涂胭脂。

sentences.english: Mike wants to get his lobe lanced.
sentences.chinese: 迈克想在耳垂上穿个孔。

sentences.english: I baptized my earlobes with rosewater.
sentences.chinese: 再用玫瑰香水洗濯耳垂。

sentences.english: Now all you gotta do is nibble on this little bitch's earlobe.
sentences.chinese: 现在你要做的是轻轻的咬这个小婊子的耳垂。

sentences.english: For the older child, measure from earlobe to bridge of nose to xiphoid .
sentences.chinese: 较大的儿童应量耳垂到鼻梁再到剑突的长度。

sentences.english: We also observed the types of external ear and lobe in 213 cases.
sentences.chinese: 对213例耳郭和耳垂的类型进行了观察。

sentences.english: Ellen’s ears glow with diamond earrings.
sentences.chinese: Ellen耳垂上的钻石耳钉闪闪发光。

sentences.english: I'll take a little blood from your ear-lobe for testing.
sentences.chinese: 我要从耳垂取一点儿血化验。

sentences.english: Luckily they were clip-ons, so my lobes suffered no real damage.
sentences.chinese: 幸好那对耳环是夹上去的，我的耳垂并没有受伤。

sentences.english: Now all you gotta do is nibble on this little bitch's earlobe..
sentences.chinese: 轻咬那小妞的耳垂就是你唯一需要做的事。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the surgical management of total auricular reconstruction utilizing a three-dimensional autologous costal cartilage framework for lobule-type microtia.
sentences.chinese: 目的利用自体肋软骨全耳郭再造矫正耳垂型小耳畸形。

sentences.english: "Dear" the dear beak in the dear concha crying.
sentences.chinese: 只用喙口对着耳垂呼唤，“亲爱的。”

sentences.english: We kissed each other's neck, earlobes;
sentences.chinese: 我们吻着对方的脖子，耳垂，相互纠缠。

sentences.english: Zita was herself unconventional, keeping a safety- pin stuck through her ear lobe.
sentences.chinese: 齐塔自己就不守传统，在一只耳垂上穿了一根别针。

sentences.english: I'll take some blood from your ear-lobe for testing.
sentences.chinese: 我要从耳垂取一点儿血化验。

sentences.english: I can touch your earlobe and slow your heartbeat.
sentences.chinese: 按摩你的耳垂就可以减慢你的心跳。

definition: the wing of the nose/ala nasi
